title: LAP: Chinese Immigrants in Mexico
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews an associate editor, Tamar Diana Wilson, on her comments in her review of the book, Chinese Immigrants in Mexico.
content:encoded: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews an associate editor, Tamar Diana Wilson, on her comments in her review of the book, Chinese Immigrants in Mexico.
itunes:subtitle: Spanish version
